source:
## Storage Account
- Do not consider bandwidth, only storage
- To identify storage accounts, look at `ResourceId` values like `Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts`
- Only relevant cost has `UnitOfMeasure` set to `1 GB/Month`

Azure Cosmos DB
microsoft.documentdb/databaseaccounts

Azure Database for MySQL
microsoft.dbformysql/servers

Azure Database for MySQL
microsoft.dbformysql/flexibleservers

Azure Database for PostgreSQL
microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servers

Azure Database for PostgreSQL

Azure Database for PostgreSQL
microsoft.dbforpostgresql/servergroupsv2

Storage
microsoft.compute/disks

## UnitOfMeasure of interest
- 1 GB/Month
- 1 GiB/Hour 
- 1 GiB/Month
- 1 TB/Month
- 1/Hour ?
- 1/Day ?
- 1/Month
##### Used to resolve the organisational unit
##### Mapping used to determine disk size for managed disks

disk_size_path = "abfss://usage@s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/services/storage-account-disk-sizes.csv"
csv_options = {'header' : True,
                'delimiter' : ';',
                'quote' : '"',
                'escape' : '"'}
disk_size_df = spark.read.options(**csv_options).csv(disk_size_path)

disk_size_df = disk_size_df.withColumn('Size', F.split(F.col('DiskSize'), ' ').getItem(0))
disk_size_df = disk_size_df.withColumn('Unit', F.split(F.col('DiskSize'), ' ').getItem(1))
disk_size_df = disk_size_df.withColumn('SizeGiB', 
    F.when(F.col('Unit') == 'TiB', F.col('Size') * 1024)
    .otherwise(F.col('Size'))

sa_df = cost_df.where((F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Storage') & ((F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts') | (F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.classicstorage/storageaccounts')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month'))
sa_df = sa_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))

sa_df = sa_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY) * GIB_PER_GB)
sa_df = sa_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
sa_df = sa_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

managed_disk_df = cost_df.where((F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Storage') & (F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.compute/disks') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Disk')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1/Month'))
managed_disk_df = managed_disk_df.withColumn('DiskType', F.split(F.col('MeterName'), ' ').getItem(0))
managed_disk_df = managed_disk_df.dropDuplicates(['Date', 'ResourceId', 'DiskType'])
managed_disk_df = managed_disk_df.join(disk_size_df, "DiskType", 'left')
managed_disk_df = managed_disk_df.select('Date' ,'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'DiskType', 'SizeGiB').withColumnRenamed('SizeGiB', 'EstimatedVolumeGiB')
managed_disk_df = managed_disk_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
managed_disk_df = managed_disk_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

disk_capacity_df = cost_df.where((F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Storage') & (F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.compute/disks') & ((F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month') | (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GiB/Hour')))
disk_capacity_df = disk_capacity_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'UnitOfMeasure', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'UnitOfMeasure', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))

disk_capacity_df = disk_capacity_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', 
    F.when(F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GiB/Hour', F.col('Quantity') / (HOURS_PER_DAY * GIB_PER_TIB)) # These capacities are denoted in GiB/Hour
    .when(F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month', (F.col('Quantity') * GIB_PER_GB * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY)) / GIB_PER_TIB) # These capacities are denoted in GiB/Month
    .otherwise(None)
)
disk_capacity_df = disk_capacity_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

sql_db_df = cost_df.where(F.col('MeterCategory') == 'SQL Database').where(F.col('MeterSubCategory').contains('Storage'))
sql_db_df = sql_db_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))
sql_db_df = sql_db_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY) * GIB_PER_GB)
sql_db_df = sql_db_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
sql_db_df = sql_db_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

sql_mi_df = sql_mi_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))
sql_mi_df = sql_mi_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY) * GIB_PER_GB)
sql_mi_df = sql_mi_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
sql_mi_df = sql_mi_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

NETAPP_CAPACITIES = [
    'Standard Capacity',
    'Ultra Capacity',
    'Premium Capacity'
]

netapp_df = cost_df.where((F.col('ResourceType') == 'microsoft.netapp/netappaccounts') & (F.col('MeterName').isin([*NETAPP_CAPACITIES, 'Backup Capacity'])))
netapp_df = netapp_df.select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'MeterName', 'AppID', 'Quantity')
netapp_df = netapp_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', 
    F.when(F.col('MeterName').isin(NETAPP_CAPACITIES), F.col('Quantity') / (HOURS_PER_DAY * GIB_PER_TIB)) # These capacities are denoted in GiB/Hour
    .when(F.col('MeterName') == 'Backup Capacity', (F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY)) / GIB_PER_TIB) # These capacities are denoted in GiB/Month
    .otherwise(None)
)
netapp_df = netapp_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

backup_df = cost_df.where((F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Backup') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month'))
backup_df = backup_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))
backup_df = backup_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY) * GIB_PER_GB)
backup_df = backup_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
backup_df = backup_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

cosmos_df = cost_df.where((F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Azure Cosmos DB') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month'))
cosmos_df = cosmos_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))
cosmos_df = cosmos_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY) * GIB_PER_GB)
cosmos_df = cosmos_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
cosmos_df = cosmos_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

mysql_df = cost_df.where((F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Azure Database for MySQL') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')) & (F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month'))
mysql_df = mysql_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'Quantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('Quantity').alias('Quantity'))
mysql_df = mysql_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB', F.col('Quantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY) * GIB_PER_GB)
mysql_df = mysql_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
mysql_df = mysql_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')

postgres_df = cost_df.where((F.col('MeterCategory') == 'Azure Database for PostgreSQL') & (F.col('MeterName').contains('Data Stored')))
postgres_df = postgres_df.withColumn('GiBQuantity', 
    F.when(F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GiB/Month', F.col('Quantity'))
    .when(F.col('UnitOfMeasure') == '1 GB/Month', F.col('Quantity') * GIB_PER_GB)
    .otherwise(None)
)
postgres_df = postgres_df \
    .select('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID', 'GiBQuantity') \
    .groupBy('Date', 'ResourceId', 'ResourceName', 'ResourceGroup', 'SubscriptionName', 'AppID') \
    .agg(F.sum('GiBQuantity').alias('GiBQuantity'))

postgres_df = postgres_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeGiB', F.col('GiBQuantity') * (HOURS_PER_MONTH / HOURS_PER_DAY))
postgres_df = postgres_df.withColumn('EstimatedVolumeTiB', F.col('EstimatedVolumeGiB') / GIB_PER_TIB)
postgres_df = postgres_df.join(app_df, 'AppID', 'left')
